name.baseName: Acrylic Staple Fiber ; Acrylonitrile ; NaSCN wet one-step process ; All sizes; NESPS2
腈纶短纤 ; 丙烯腈 ; NaSCN湿法一步法 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该过程涉及通过湿法一步法使用丙烯腈和NaSCN生产的腈纶短纤维，在纺织制造的多种规模中适用。该过程也适用于需要高质量腈纶纤维的工业应用材料的生产。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码28,三级代码282.0,四级代码2823文件，在完整版文件中第608页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + physicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是物理化学法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法+物理化学法，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management82，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是物理化学法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为82，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Petroleum-related wasteisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + physicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标石油类的末端治理技术是物理化学法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法+物理化学法，其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为石油类，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
nan
源文件中描述为为腈纶短纤，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Petroleum-related wasteisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management65，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标石油类的末端治理技术是物理化学法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为65，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为石油类，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the treatment technology for the pollution of Waste waterdidn't offered
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisAdsorption + steam desorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management62，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是吸附+蒸汽解析，其效率为62，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisDirect combustion，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management62，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是直接燃烧，其效率为62，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + physicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management93，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是物理化学法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法+物理化学法，其效率为93，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisAbsorption + diversion，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management32，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
